greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 7^n mod 43.
comment: Sequence is periodic with length 6. Since a(21) = 42 (or -1), 43 is prime in Z[sqrt(7)]. - _Alonso del Arte_, Oct 12 2012
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,-1,1).
program: (Sage) [power_mod(7,n,43) for n in range(0,83)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 27 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 12 2002
